mapper.select: SELECT RC_NUM, RC_TITLE, RC_REGDATE, RC_ID, RC_CNT, RC_LIKE, RC_CONTENT, RC_IMAGE, R FROM (SELECT RC_NUM, RC_TITLE, RC_REGDATE, RC_ID, RC_CNT, RC_LIKE, RC_CONTENT, RC_IMAGE, ROWNUM R FROM (SELECT RC_NUM, RC_TITLE, RC_REGDATE, RC_ID, RC_CNT, RC_LIKE, RC_CONTENT, RC_IMAGE FROM RECOMMEND ORDER BY RC_CNT DESC) ) WHERE R BETWEEN 1 AND 3
mapper.update: UPDATE RECOMMEND SET RC_CNT = NVL(RC_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE RC_NUM = #{RC_NUM}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECOMMEND VALUES( RC_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{RC_TITLE}, SYSDATE, #{RC_ID}, 0, 0, #{RC_CONTENT}, #{RC_IMAGE} )
mapper.select: SELECT RC_NUM, RC_TITLE, RC_CONTENT, RC_REGDATE FROM RECOMMEND WHERE RC_NUM = #{RC_NUM}
mapper.update: UPDATE RECOMMEND SET RC_TITLE = #{RC_TITLE}, RC_CONTENT = #{RC_CONTENT} WHERE RC_NUM = #{RC_NUM}
